content: tackle the fair isle technique to create this moonbeam-inspired crochet sweater worked from the top down and featured in red heart super saver and red heart super saver bitty stripes the pattern highlights a yoke stitched in split single_crochet to create a knitted effect while the body and sleeves are crafted in a textured single/double_crochet stitch a distinctive garment in any colors you choose the design is a unique addition to your cold-weather wardrobe materials sizes xs/s m l xl 2/3xl 4/5xl red heart® super saver® bitty stripes™ 10 oz/283 g 515 yds/471 m main color mc moonbeam 0102 2 3 3 3 3 4 balls red heart ® super saver® 7 oz/198 g 364 yds/333 m contrast a black 0312 1 1 1 1 1 1 ball sizes to fit chest measurement xs/s 28-34 71-86 5 cm m 36-38 91 5-96 5 cm l 40-42 101 5-106 5 cm xl 44-46 112-117 cm 2/3xl 48-54 122-137 cm 4/5xl 56-62 142-157 5 cm
